text: Sherwood Pictures is a movie-making company based in Albany, Georgia. The company is a ministry of Sherwood Baptist Church. It is run by Alex Kendrick, the pastor of Sherwood Baptist Church. == Filmography == *Flywheel - released on April 9, 2003 *Facing the Giants - released on September 29, 2006 *Fireproof - released on September 26, 2008 *Courageous - released on September 30, 2011 == References == == Other websites == *Official company website Category:Albany, Georgia Category:Christian organizations based in the United States Category:American movie studios Category:Companies based in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Sherwood Pictures
